welcome.text1: You are the living legacy of Your School. Your achievements inspire our current students and your continued connection strengthens our community.
welcome.text2: Whether you graduated last year or decades ago, this is your space to reconnect, share memories, mentor the next generation, and celebrate the journey that began here.

notable.name: Jane Wanjiku
notable.currentRole: Advocate for STEM Education in Kenya • Mentor to young tech entrepreneurs

notable.name: Joshua Agengo
notable.currentRole: Former UN Youth Ambassador • Promotes peace, diplomacy, and global youth engagement

notable.name: Sam Onyango
notable.currentRole: Advocate for Community Health Programs • Pioneer in public health initiatives in Africa

notable.name: David Njoroge
notable.currentRole: Supporting Education and Sports Development • Invests in youth empowerment projects

notable.name: Mary Achieng
notable.currentRole: Promotes Literacy and Girls' Education in Kenya • Founder of community-based reading programs
